data.label: 离线语音合成
data.description: 将文字信息转化为声音信息，让应用具备离线语音合成的能力。即让机器像人一样开口说话，给开发者的应用配上“嘴巴”。

data.label: 离线语音合成
data.description: Converts text information into voice information, giving applications the ability for offline speech synthesis. That is, making machines speak like humans, equipping developers' applications with a 'mouth'.
